8.title: Clean the World
8.plot: In this Weekly Report, Grace Ng reports on Clean the World, a nonprofit that partners with hotels to recycle unused soap and shampoo. The recycled soap is donated to communities around the world as part of a mission to build better health through hygiene.

12.title: The Sneaker Saint
12.plot: In this Weekly Report, Grace Ng reports on Hav A Sole, founded by Rikki Mendias, and inspired by an experience he had as a child. Hav A Sole provides homeless and at-risk youth with new shoes.

15.title: The Hippo Water Roller
15.plot: In this Weekly Report, Grace Ng reports on the Hippo Water Roller, designed for use by villages in rural Africa. The Hippo Water Roller helps families save time and strain on their necks and spines by making water collection much more efficient.

imdb.plot outline: "World Changers" is an upbeat and positive news program, which will help change the media conversation and show our viewers that each of us has the power to make a difference in the world. World Changers highlights sustainable solutions to poverty from around the world and is built around an ensemble of dynamic on-camera talent, all of them experts or influencers in their respective fields. Each episode focuses on a specific theme, and gives calls to action based on the show topics so that when our audience is inspired by a segment, they can easily get involved by donating or volunteering.
imdb.title: World Changers
plot: _World Changers_ (qv) highlights sustainable solutions to poverty from around the world.

"_World Changers_ (qv)" is an upbeat and positive news program, which will help change the media conversation and show our viewers that each of us has the power to make a difference in the world. _World Changers_ (qv) highlights sustainable solutions to poverty from around the world and is built around an ensemble of dynamic on-camera talent, all of them experts or influencers in their respective fields. Each episode focuses on a specific theme, and gives calls to action based on the show topics so that when our audience is inspired by a segment, they can easily get involved by donating or volunteering.
